translation.en: Hold all my calls.
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
Girls, it's time.
Dad, no.
I have to keep feeding the Christmas Panda or the Panda will die.
translation.es: Debo seguir alimentando al Panda de Navidad o morirá.

translation.en: [gasps] His death is on your conscience. I hope bedtime was worth it.
translation.es: Debo seguir alimentando al Panda de Navidad o morirá. Si muere será tu culpa. Espero valga la pena dormir.

translation.en: Who said bedtime?
It's time for the grand finale of Templeton Christmas Traditions.
translation.es: Es hora del final de Tradiciones Navideñas Templeton.

translation.en: Dad tells a holiday-themed story until you fall asleep. Whoo!
translation.es: Papá te contará un cuento hasta que te duermas.

translation.en: Do we have to? I'm in the middle of something.
Christmas, Christmas, Christmas-- Hey.
Why do we have to do something just because it's a tradition?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tenemos que hacer algo por tradición?

translation.en: I know someone who felt the same way you did.
translation.es: Conozco a alguien que sentía lo mismo.

translation.en: Who? Do I know them? Do they have a beard?
Or a curse that makes them sing?
It was actually your Uncle Ted.
translation.es: De hecho era tu tío Ted.

translation.en: And once upon a time...
Sneaky story intro.
When he was a baby, he hated our Christmas traditions,
translation.es: De bebé, él odiaba las tradiciones navideñas,

translation.en: even though they were the most awesome traditions ever.
translation.es: aunque eran las tradiciones más asombrosas.

translation.en: Five days before Christmas, we played...
[all] Shock That Elf.
-It's your dad's year to be the elf. -All right.
translation.es: - Le toca a tu papá ser el duende. - Bien.

translation.en: But me and my elf buddy here are pretty hard to--
translation.es: Pero mi amiguito y yo somos difíciles...

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -[shouts]
[adult Tim] Four days before Christmas, we'd make cards for our grandparents.
translation.es: Cuatro días antes, hacíamos tarjetas para los abuelos.

translation.en: A Christmas tree.
A reindeer.
The baby made Santa's sleigh.
[adult Tim] Three days before Christmas, we'd sing the most soulful
translation.es: Tres días antes cantábamos la interpretación más conmovedora

translation.en: bass-and-glockenspiel rendition
of "The Night Before Christmas" you've ever heard.
♪ 'Twas the night before Christmas And all through the house ♪
translation.es: La noche antes de Navidad Y por toda la casa

translation.en: ♪ Not a creature was stirring Not even a mouse ♪
translation.es: Ni una criatura se movía Ni siquiera un ratón

translation.en: [adult Tim] Two days before Uncle Ted's first Christmas,
translation.es: Dos días antes de su primera Navidad,

translation.en: that's when the magic started.
Work with me, baby.
Aw, there. Our handsome little elf.
Ooh! I'm gonna grab the camera.
I thought Christmas was a day, not a month.
translation.es: Creí que era un día, no un mes.

translation.en: You can't contain Templeton traditions to one day.
translation.es: No puedes reducirla a un día.

translation.en: That's like trying to hold eight ants. Too many ants.
You performed "The Night Before Christmas" three days before.
translation.es: Cantaste "La Noche Antes de Navidad" tres días antes.

translation.en: Performing it on the actual night before Christmas is bad luck.
translation.es: Hacerlo antes de Navidad es de mala suerte.

translation.en: Uh, you put a gingerbread fellow in my pocket?
Because it is good luck.
And yet I'm still here,
wearing this.
Where's yours?
Not participating in today's "dress like a court jester" tradition?
translation.es: ¿No participarás en la tradición de hoy?

translation.en: That's not today's tradition. We--
translation.es: No es la tradición de hoy.

translation.en: Who's ready to get their pictures taken with Santa?
translation.es: ¿Quién está listo para la foto con Santa?

translation.en: I'll be right there with you the whole time.
We sit on his lap, tell him what we want.
translation.es: Nos sentamos, le decimos qué queremos.

translation.en: It's the easiest and best tradition. You don't have to freak out.
translation.es: Es la tradición más fácil. No te asustes.

translation.en: Danny?
Tim, check this out.
A snowball?
I'm gonna throw it in Santa's face.
translation.es: Se la tiraré a Santa en la cara.

translation.en: What? You'll get on the naughty list.
Oh, I'm always on the naughty list.
translation.es: Siempre estoy en su lista negra.

translation.en: I don't give old Kringle the power to suppress my animal instincts.
translation.es: No dejaré que reprima mis instintos animales.

translation.en: But only good kids get presents.
Do only they?
Naughty-listers get the greatest present of all, coal.
translation.es: Reciben el mejor de todos: carbón.

translation.en: The black rock with a million uses.
Heat, decoration, other. It's a win-win.
Want me to split this in two? We can totally flank Santa.
No, I work hard to stay on the nice list.
translation.es: No, me esfuerzo para ser bueno.

translation.en: Who do you think gave them quarters for massages?
Suit yourself.
We should probably get up.
I've been trying to.
Come on up.
Timothy Templeton. Four T's in it.
This is Theodore. Same last name, one less T.
translation.es: Él es Theodore. Mismo apellido, una T menos.

translation.en: Boss Baby.
Um, what is happening?
We used to work together, a long time ago.
Wait, Santa is--
Former Baby Corp.
As disloyal as a cat with trade secrets to sell.
translation.es: Tan desleal como un gato con secretos.

translation.en: Oh, Boss Baby.
I'm just trying to spread joy and happiness.
Blah, blah, blah. I heard it all the day you quit. When will Mommy and Daddy take a picture?
translation.es: Lo escuché todo cuando te fuiste. ¿Cuándo tomarán la foto?

translation.en: -Honey, take a picture. -I'm trying, I'm just so relaxed.
translation.es: - Toma la foto. - Eso intento, estoy muy relajada.

translation.en: I left Baby Corp because I had this idea
translation.es: Dejé Bebé Corp porque tuve la idea

translation.en: of how to make the world a happier place with Christmas cheer.
translation.es: de hacer feliz al mundo con la Navidad.

translation.en: Think it's working?
You're doing fine.
Don't side with this hippie.
translation.es: No te pongas de su lado.

translation.en: He betrayed everything Baby Corp stands for.
translation.es: Traicionó lo que Bebé Corp representa.

translation.en: He poached half the company for his toys-for-nothing program.
translation.es: Invirtió la empresa para su programa de regalos,

translation.en: And he's exploiting baby labor to make those toys.
translation.es: y tiene a bebés fabricando esos regalos.

translation.en: Elves. Elves make the toys.
Oh, come on. That's just marketing.
Whoa, they are babies?
-Okay, say cheese. -Cheese.
Smile for your parents.
I will never be caught smiling with a commie like--
translation.es: Nunca sonreiré con un comunista como...

translation.en: Gotcha.
-[grunting] -I'm on the nice list, right?
Tippy top.
Yes. For Christmas, I want Football Mike Canadian Football Edition
translation.es: Sí. De Navidad, quiero a Futbol Mike edición canadiense

translation.en: with the locker room Jacuzzi playset.
You write that request in official letter form?
Now he loves paperwork.
You know it.
Drop it off with my elves, and have a Merry Christmas.
translation.es: Déjalo con los duendes, y feliz Navidad.

translation.en: Thanks, Santa. You too, bye.
I see you, Danny Petrosky.
Naughty list life forever.
See? Wasn't that fun, little guy?
Look, Cracklin' Bones O'Dell and the Caroling Cracklettes.
translation.es: Mira, Bones O'Dell y las Caroling Cracklettes.

translation.en: Put me down. I have a score to settle.
You won't do anything to get me on the naughty list?
I'm not a monster, Templeton.
Santa Claus is.
So, Ron, you like getting mail?
Well, here's a special delivery.
Not like you to be sleeping on the job on Christmas Eve, Dongle.
translation.es: No es propio de ti dormir en Nochebuena.

translation.en: It's Christmas Eve? Where am--? Oh!
You still owe me 300 hollyberries, Dongle. Pay up.
translation.es: Aún me debes 300 bayas, Dongle. Paga.

translation.en: Why are you calling me--? Where--?
Don't play dumb, Dongle.
I want my money before Boxing Day. Get it?
Do get it. Not Dongle.
Dongle! I'm so jolly to see you.
Not Dongle.
What's up with your voice, Dongle? Are you sick?
I'm not Dongle.
Everybody, come quick.
Dongle's sick.
Can you see? Look at me.
I'm not Dongle!
[Tim] It's Christmas Eve.
-You'll love it. -Santa, Dongle is sorry for sleep--
translation.es: - Te gustará. - Santa, Dongle lamenta dormir...

translation.en: -What did you do with my brother? -What did you do with Santa?
translation.es: - ¿Qué le hiciste? - ¿Qué le hiciste a Santa?

translation.en: Oh, no. Are you...?
Dongle's name is Ding Dong Dongle.
translation.es: El nombre de Dongle es Ding Dong Dongle.

translation.en: Yeah, but you're an elf?
Superior toymaker of the North Pole.
When Dongle makes a toy, so many jaws drop to the floor
translation.es: Cuando fabrica un juguete, tantos quedan boquiabiertos

translation.en: that the jaw doctor can buy a new mansion.
translation.es: que se necesita un doctor para cerrarles la boca.

translation.en: You made a rocking horse from the crib?
Is it perfect?
Then yes.
Wait, so if you're here, then my brother is...
translation.es: Espera, si estás aquí, mi hermano está...

translation.en: At the North Pole, of course. Does Dongle look like he is from Texas?
translation.es: En el Polo Norte, claro. ¿Dongle parece que es de Texas?

translation.en: Imagine cowboy hat Dongle.
Very handsome.
So he's with Santa? Aw.
We gotta get him back now.
It's his first Christmas. We have more traditions he has to do.
translation.es: Es su primera Navidad. Hay más tradiciones por realizar.

translation.en: Dongle needs to get back now.
Or the world will be bombarded with inferior toys
that blacken children's hearts.
My brother works at Baby Corp, so all we--
translation.es: Mi hermano trabaja en Bebé Corp...

translation.en: Baby Corp. Can't make toys to save their lives.
translation.es: Bebé Corp. No hace juguetes para salvarse.

translation.en: Does that situation come up a lot?
Dongle could tell you stories.
Yes, please. But later.
Baby Corp is our only hope to get out of this.
translation.es: Son nuestra esperanza para salir de esto.

translation.en: Jimbo, Staci, we have a situation.
"Tommy wants a fire engine, red."
-TWAFER. TWAFER. -[door opens]
Not now, Dongle.
I'm not Dongle, Ron.
Boss Baby? What the jingles are you doing here?
The question is, how the jingles do I get out of here?
translation.es: La pregunta es: ¿cómo salgo de aquí?

translation.en: Oh. I'd love to help, but I'm memorizing letters.
If I don't get their requests locked down, it'll take me weeks to deliver gifts.
translation.es: Si no aprendo sus pedidos, me tomará semanas repartirlos.

translation.en: Speaking of jingles, "jingle."
"Judy is now getting lavender earmuffs." J-I-N-G-L-E. JINGLE.
You're an embarrassment to efficiency. Get a computer.
The elves and I are like a family business.
They make the toys, I do this.
These are our family traditions,
and they've made everyone happy for a long time.
translation.es: y han hecho felices a todos.

translation.en: Yay for your family. Take me home to mine, Big Beard.
translation.es: Hurra por tu familia. Llévame con la mía.

translation.en: I'm busy. I'll take you tonight when I deliver presents.
translation.es: Te llevaré cuando reparta los regalos.

translation.en: What do I do in the meantime?
Help make a few toys,
and maybe learn about the Christmas spirit.
-Any word on rescuing my brother? -Sorry, ran into a snag.
translation.es: - ¿Qué se sabe del rescate? - Tuve un imprevisto.

translation.en: Typical Baby Corp incompetence.
Typical Dongle excellence.
I won that trophy for excellence in trophy modeling.
translation.es: Gané ese por modelaje de trofeos.

translation.en: Stop making stuff out of stuff. What's the snag?
translation.es: Deja de hacer cosas con cosas. ¿Qué imprevisto?

translation.en: Chupie tech is jammed at the North Pole. Stupid Santa Claus.
translation.es: La fórmula está varada en el Polo Norte. Santa tonto.

translation.en: Watch your mouth, Baby Corp mongrel.
It's less than 24 hours until my brother's first Christmas.
translation.es: Menos de 24 horas para su primera Navidad.

translation.en: If we can't chupie there, we have to find another way.
translation.es: Si no podemos ir, debemos encontrar otra forma.

translation.en: Mom and Dad will be worried sick.
You relax. Dongle will take care of everything.
translation.es: Tranquilos. Dongle se encargará de todo.

translation.en: This one's from Aunt Dorothy. "Merry Christmas from Aunt Dorothy."
translation.es: Esta es de la tía Dorothy. "Feliz Navidad".

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
Is that a grenade?
Don't be foolish. Dongle doesn't explode parents.
translation.es: No seas tonto. Dongle no hace explotar a los padres.

translation.en: Dongle kills with poison gas.
translation.es: Dongle los mata con gas venenoso.

translation.en: What?
[Mom] Do you smell?
Dongle told a sick joke.
This is Santa's sleeping dust for when the children stay up to see him.
translation.es: Es polvo para dormir cuando los niños no se duermen.

translation.en: What the heck?
Drama is the spice of life.
translation.es: Drama es el picante de la vida.

translation.en: Should give us time to get to the North Pole and back.
translation.es: Nos debe dar tiempo para ir y volver.

translation.en: But with them asleep,
I have to do the shopping for our traditional fruitcake hockey.
translation.es: debo hacer las compras para la torta de frutas.

translation.en: Which we play while wearing Hawaiian leis made from snacks. So fun.
translation.es: Jugamos usando guirnaldas hawaianas de bocadillos.

translation.en: Point is, we need to move fast.
No sweat. Santa has magic portals in every mall.
translation.es: Tranquilos. Santa tiene portales mágicos en cada tienda.

translation.en: They appear every night after business hours,
but only until 9 a.m. the day before Christmas.
translation.es: hasta las 9 a. m. antes de Navidad.

translation.en: We have 20 minutes.
Why didn't you tell us before?
Were you not paying attention when Dongle told you drama is the spice of life?
translation.es: ¿No escuchaste cuando Dongle dijo el drama es el picante de la vida?

translation.en: So this is where Christmas comes from?
You bet.
We got Jingly Jangly there doing wrapping paper design.
translation.es: Tenemos a Jingly Jangly diseñando el papel.

translation.en: Ribbon testing with Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
translation.es: Tippy Tappy Sloppy con los moños.

translation.en: Okay, okay, that one is good.
[PoopyDoopy] Lala Doo-Da and Diddly Doo write all the best carols.
translation.es: Lala Doo-Da y Diddly Doo escriben villancicos.

translation.en: What kind of nog-house open-mic garbage is that?
You wouldn't know a hit if it knocked your tooth out.
translation.es: No reconocerías un éxito si te golpeara.

translation.en: And of course, toy-making with me, PoopyDoopy, filling in for Dongle.
translation.es: Y, claro, yo fabrico juguetes, PoopyDoopy por Dongle.

translation.en: I admire your skill.
Why thank you.
But I can't help noticing inefficiencies in your systems.
translation.es: No puedo ignorar las ineficiencias en su sistema.

translation.en: What?
I notice you make all your gingerbread from the eggs of a single goose?
translation.es: ¿Veo que hacen las galletas con huevos de un solo ganso?

translation.en: That's not just a goose. She's Ginger the Gingergoose.
translation.es: No es un ganso. Es Ginger, la ganso de jengibre.

translation.en: Sure. And dare I ask a follow-up?
Why have those elves been rubbing gumdrops on the egg for two hours?
translation.es: ¿Por qué le frotan gomitas al huevo?

translation.en: To make it the best gingerbread in the whole world.
translation.es: Para hacer la mejor galleta del mundo.

translation.en: Dubious claim.
Try this.
This is really good. What's the secret?
It's made with store-bought chicken eggs and was stuffed in my pocket.
translation.es: Está hecha con huevos de tienda, y la tenía en el bolsillo.

translation.en: [all] Delicious.
You guys get it now?
We need to put our gingerbread in your pocket.
translation.es: Pongamos las galletas en los bolsillos.

translation.en: No, my point is efficiency.
translation.es: No, me refiero a la eficiencia.

translation.en: You can't mess up gingerbread. Just crack eggs in some batter.
translation.es: No pueden arruinarlas. Pongan huevos en la masa.

translation.en: Why does this goose even have a job, right, Ginger?
translation.es: ¿Por qué el ganso tiene trabajo, cierto?

translation.en: -[squawks] -What else needs fixing around here?
You're watching paint dry? I thought you were on a deadline.
translation.es: ¿Ven la pintura secarse? Pensé que tenían un plazo.

translation.en: -We take pride in our wrapping paper. -Just to be torn open?
translation.es: - Nos enorgullece el papel regalo. - ¿Para romperlo?

translation.en: You're wasting time.
But this is the way we've always done things.
translation.es: Así es como siempre lo hemos hecho.

translation.en: Not anymore.
Boom, efficiency. Hit me with another one.
Carol writers, right?
Supposed to be.
But Diddly Doo overdid it on the milk and cookies again.
translation.es: Diddly Doo exageró con la leche y las galletas.

translation.en: Well, excuse me, Mother.
You ever feel like working?
We'll work when I tell you.
If I can make a suggestion-- Oh!
[both] Don't mess with our creative process.
You've got the talent of a wreath.
They're fine. What else you got?
I'm not laughing. Toss it.
Spin me up on this nonsense.
Everyone knows, ribbon is no good if it doesn't tickle me.
translation.es: Todos saben, no son bueno si no me mueve.

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
Oh, but it is.
No, it's not.
Pretty sure it is.
He's a genius.
Could it be, everything we've been doing has been wrong?
translation.es: ¿Puede ser que hemos hecho mal las cosas?

translation.en: No telling, but yes.
Please, walk with me.
[gasps] A walk-and-talk? You're getting the hang of this efficiency thing.
translation.es: ¿Caminar y hablar? Ya entienden la eficiencia.

translation.en: You're telling me.
You've been here an hour, and our productivity is up 20 percent.
translation.es: En una hora nuestra productividad aumentó 20 por ciento.

translation.en: We might actually get a nog break before Santa leaves.
translation.es: Quizá podamos descansar antes de que salga Santa.

translation.en: Why settle for nog? Imagine what else you could have.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Imaginen lo que podrían tener.

translation.en: Computers for naughty/nice cross-reference.
Industrial ovens for mass gingerbread baking.
translation.es: Hornos industriales para hornear en grande.

translation.en: Break rooms full of gumdrop delights.
And of course, mahogany crafters' lamps.
Yes, to ward off snow monsters.
Mahogany lamps ward off snow monsters?
Mahogany does.
Weird, I was just trying to class up the joint.
translation.es: Qué raro, solo quería darle clase al sitio.

translation.en: We should redo this entire floor in mahogany.
Mahogany? No. Why?
It'd help Christmas cheer if no one was eaten by a snow monster.
translation.es: Alegraría la Navidad si el monstruo de nieve no se come a nadie.

translation.en: These reforms will take an upfront investment.
translation.es: Estas reformas necesitan de una inversión.

translation.en: What's your cash on hand?
Fifty trillion hollyberries.
translation.es: Cincuenta billones de bayas de acebo.

translation.en: -In dollars? -Seven.
Okay, we need to raise revenue.
What do you charge to get on the nice list?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto por estar en la lista de los buenos?

translation.en: The only charge is being the best you can-- [Boss Baby] Honk, honk.
translation.es: El cobro es ser lo mejor que...

translation.en: You sillies are practically feeding cash to the reindeer.
translation.es: Prácticamente alimentan los renos con dinero.

translation.en: But it's always been free.
And your boss always wears a red suit to a home invasion.
translation.es: Y su jefe va de rojo para un allanamiento.

translation.en: Tradition's a dumb reason to do anything.
You're running a business that's stalled out below its potential.
translation.es: Dirigen un negocio por debajo de su potencial.

translation.en: It's killing my soul.
But good news?
You've got me.
The portal.
What? Yes. Hurry up, let's go.
Unmade toys, Dongle is coming.
You had to stop at the snack cart?
I'm pulling double duty.
I have to rescue my brother and keep my family traditions from dying.
translation.es: Debo rescatar a mi hermano y evitar que las tradiciones mueran.

translation.en: Stop being so dramatic. There has to be a simple solution.
translation.es: Deja de ser tan dramático. Debe haber una solución.

translation.en: Four plane tickets to the North Pole.
Great. Does anyone have $11,000?
I have 700 hollyberries.
I had to buy a winter hat.
I only have 10K five hunny.
So close.
Look, super speedy delivery.
"Santa letters and packages delivered to the North Pole before midnight"?
translation.es: ¿"Cartas a Santa y paquetes enviados antes de media noche"?

translation.en: We follow the next delivery truck to the airport,
sneak on a jet disguised as food-service workers.
When the crew asks, "Is that low-fat?"
I go, "No, it's high fist."
Double thumpers into a roundhouse kick.
We've put two on the ground, because I'm good at kicking.
translation.es: Dos abajo porque soy buena pateando.

translation.en: But we can't control the cockpit until we defeat six crooked co-pilots,
translation.es: No podemos controlar la cabina con los pilotos,

translation.en: each trained in a deadly martial art.
My plan was better.
Oh! Watch your elbows, Jimbo.
[Tim] Dongle, don't eat all my snacks.
-[Dongle] Dongle is not eating anything. -[chewing]
I hear little Chloe is on the naughty list...
What's it worth to you to get Josie into nice?
Start Scooter on the $50 nice package...
Isn't everything more beautiful when it's profitable?
translation.es: ¿No es más lindo cuando hay ganancias?

translation.en: This makes me feel yucky,
like a sticky candy cane that fell on a floor.
translation.es: como los bastones de dulce en el piso.

translation.en: Remember, you're helping to finance more efficient toy-making.
translation.es: Ayudan a financiar un proceso más eficiente.

translation.en: Things are looking up for your compensation.
We're gonna get more Christmas cheer?
-You get paid in Christmas cheer? -I wish.
We get paid in twinkly smiles,
which can be exchanged for Christmas cheer.
translation.es: las cuales se cambian por alegría.

translation.en: You have to trade in at the Santa shop.
They're only open for a half-hour on Thursdays.
translation.es: Solo abren media hora los jueves.

translation.en: Unless you send your smiles by penguin messenger, which takes months.
translation.es: O si las mandas con un pingüino, pero tarda meses.

translation.en: What kind of hustle is Santa running on you?
We love Santa. We're like a family business.
translation.es: Queremos a Santa. Somos un negocio familiar.

translation.en: Are you? I know Dasher and Dancer and Prancer and Vixen.
translation.es: ¿Sí? Conozco a Dasher, Dancer, Prancer y Vixen.

translation.en: All the reindeer do for 364 days a year is eat grass and poop.
translation.es: Por 364 días comen pasto y hacen popó.

translation.en: You elves do all the work, and I couldn't name one of you.
translation.es: Ustedes hacen el trabajo, y no sé sus nombres.

translation.en: Except you, DookiePoops.
-PoopyDoopy. -Forget how things have always been done.
translation.es: - PoopyDoopy. - Olviden cómo se hacen las cosas.

translation.en: What do you deserve right now?
I would like a little recognition.
[all] Yeah.
-Right. -We should talk to Santa.
[man 1] Last delivery for the season.
[man 2] Put it there, right next to the gigantic pile of letters.
translation.es: Ponlo ahí con la pila gigante de cartas.

translation.en: -[man 1] Merry Chri-- -[door closes]
We're here.
Good. Dongle is hungry.
Even though Dongle did not eat the snacks.
Uh, you aren't letters to Santa. I'm disappointed.
translation.es: No son cartas para Santa. Qué decepción.

translation.en: But I like feeling disappointed, so mixed bag.
translation.es: Pero me gusta sentirme así, paquete extraviado.

translation.en: Remove your funeral suit, sad vampire.
Dongle is here.
Is this the North Pole?
"North Pole." Yay, we're here.
[Tim] It says "Noth Pole." You left out the R.
At least I didn't write it backwards. We could've ended up in Elop Htron.
translation.es: No lo escribí al revés. Pudimos terminar en Olop Etron.

translation.en: This is the Noth Pole?
I'm the Noth Pole. That's my name.
translation.es: Yo soy Noth Pole. Es mi nombre.

translation.en: I changed it so all the letters to Santa with that misspelled word come to me.
translation.es: Lo cambié para que las cartas con ese error me llegaran a mí.

translation.en: It's thrilling.
That's a weird thing to be excited about.
Why? This is a pile of hopes and dreams
translation.es: Es una pila de esperanzas y sueños

translation.en: I can sell to collectors for a lot of money.
translation.es: que puedo vender por mucho dinero.

translation.en: We need to get to the North Pole. And quick. Is that possible?
translation.es: Debemos ir al Polo Norte. Y rápido. ¿Es posible?

translation.en: It's a 30-minute chartered jet ride.
translation.es: Es un viaje de media hora.

translation.en: I can make anything happen.
I'm Noth Pole.
-Yay. -[Noth] But I won't.
I don't really feel like it. Don't touch my pile.
translation.es: No tengo ganas. No toquen mi pila.

translation.en: Dongle touched nothing.
These letters go for a fortune in Tokyo, along with gum chewed by politicians,
translation.es: Valen una fortuna en Tokio, igual el chicle mascado por políticos,

translation.en: industrial blueprints from mobile home manufacturers...
What happens with the kids who wrote the letters?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa con los que las mandaron?

translation.en: They just don't get what they want for Christmas.
translation.es: No reciben lo que pidieron de Navidad.

translation.en: What? That's horrible.
No, I think you missed it. I get money.
Making money off of Christmas?
That's crazy.
Thank you, boy.
Your shouted words have inspired me to change--
translation.es: Dijiste cosas que me inspiraron a cambiar...

translation.en: Yay, it's a Christmas miracle.
--my business model.
When Santa doesn't deliver and children weep,
translation.es: Cuando Santa no manda y los niños lloran,

translation.en: parents will do anything to get them their toys,
translation.es: los padres harán lo que sea por sus juguetes,

translation.en: even buy them from me at a huge markup.
translation.es: incluso los compran por mucho dinero.

translation.en: Don't you use my ideas for evil.
translation.es: No uses mis ideas para el mal.

translation.en: You turned my letters into a nutcracker in ten seconds?
-No. -[Noth] No, him.
Five seconds.
Ten is for lazy toymakers who are not Dongle.
translation.es: Diez es para flojos que no son Dongle.

translation.en: I like his style.
I've devised a deal.
I'll charter that flight,
but Dongle stays with me to make 10,000 toys for profit.
translation.es: pero Dongle se queda para hacer 10 000 juguetes para vender.

translation.en: No, we're not leaving Dongle.
Go save your brother with the handsome face
that would look better in glasses.
Dongle will catch up.
-You sure? -Merry Christmas.
You press that button, Dongle will get you out of any jam.
translation.es: Oprime ese botón, Dongle te sacará de problemas.

translation.en: Mostly toy-building jams. That is where the button is of most use.
translation.es: Mayormente de juguetes. Para eso lo usan bastante.

translation.en: -Thank you, Dongle. -Okay, this hug is done.
I'm going to the North Pole.
How do you handle the excitement of being at the real North Pole?
translation.es: ¿Cómo manejas la emoción de estar allá?

translation.en: You don't.
It looks like Baby Corp.
[Jimbo] But Christmas-ier.
Let's go over the plan.
Me and Tim look for Boss.
I'll find what they're using to jam our chupie transport tech, and smash it.
translation.es: Yo veré qué usan para interferir y lo destruiré.

translation.en: Got that, Tim?
I'm at the North Pole.
Can you keep it together?
I'm actually in Santa Town. I'm gonna...
translation.es: Estoy en Ciudad de Santa. Voy a...

translation.en: Um, hello?
Anyone home?
Anyone making toys?
Anyone Santa?
It's gingerbread.
Jimbo. Don't eat the toy factory--
translation.es: Jimbo. No te comas la fábrica de juguetes...

translation.en: Dang, break me off some of that wall.
translation.es: Cielos, dame un poco de esa pared.

translation.en: Stop chewing. I hear actual North Pole Christmas Cheer.
translation.es: Dejen de masticar. Escucho alegría navideña.

translation.en: Then Santa said, "Thanks, Tippy Tappy Slappy."
But I'm not Tippy Tappy Slappy. I'm Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
translation.es: No soy Tippy Tappy Slappy. Soy Tippy Tappy Sloppy.

translation.en: Ugh. Breaks my heart.
Who's got another complaint about Santa's mismanagement?
translation.es: ¿Quién tiene otra queja por el mal manejo de Santa?

translation.en: There's the boss. Hi.
We should have suggestion boxes, but we don't.
translation.es: Debe haber un buzón de sugerencias.

translation.en: So how do we suggest we get one?
What did you do?
Uh, good to see you too.
Where's the fun and jolly toy making? This is Santa's factory.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está la diversión? Es la fábrica de Santa.

translation.en: Really? It's Santa who clocks in? Santa who carves the horsies?
translation.es: ¿Es Santa el que marca tarjeta? ¿El que talla?

translation.en: Santa spring-loading jack-in-the-boxes?
You're messing with Christmas.
It's a mess. I'm cleaning it up.
Christmas is perfect. Everyone loves Santa and his elves.
translation.es: La Navidad es perfecta. Todos aman a Santa.

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt.
We're trying to recall Santa's nicknames, but couldn't remember.
translation.es: Intentamos recordar los apodos de Santa, pero nada.

translation.en: Can you help us?
Sure, Santa, Santa Clause, St. Nick, Kriss Kringle, Father Christmas--
translation.es: Santa, Santa Clause, San Nicolás, Kriss Kringle, Padre...

translation.en: Cool, cool.
-Now name an elf. -What?
You said, everyone loves Santa and his elves.
translation.es: Dijiste, todos aman a Santa y a sus duendes.

translation.en: You know every single one of Santa's nicknames.
translation.es: Conoces todos los apodos de Santa.

translation.en: Surely you know just one of our names.
translation.es: Seguro conoces uno de los nuestros.

translation.en: Blitzen?
Blitzen? Blitzen?
Kid's confusing us with those antlered stink horses?
You done did it now.
[PoopyDoopy] I'm done being a cog in the Christmas wheel.
translation.es: Me harté de ser un engranaje en esta rueda.

translation.en: A wheel we probably made.
[shouts] Santa's factory? Ha!
This is our factory.
[elves] Yeah!
Santa?
How long have you been-- What did you hear?
Enough.
All I wanted was to make everyone happy.
Well, you sure blew that.
Yeah.
[elf] We should get better than this.
You're right.
I hope I can do better next year.
-[elves gasping] -[PoopyDoopy] Not the naughty list.
translation.es: No en la de los malos.

translation.en: Santa.
There he is. On his sleigh.
-I can't believe it. -I know.
He teleported to a sleigh that would take two minutes to walk to.
translation.es: Se teletransportó al trineo que está a dos minutos.

translation.en: Explains the, uh... [grunts]
No, I can't believe he's gone.
translation.es: No puedo creer que se fuera.

translation.en: Santa can't go on the naughty list. He's Santa.
translation.es: Santa no puede estar en esa lista.

translation.en: Why does it feel like a man cave on Mother's Day?
A re-org like this usually takes weeks.
We should be celebrating.
Yeah, get it.
We had a misunderstanding.
Got the chupies working. Let's jet.
Look at that. Still time to play fruitcake lacrosse.
translation.es: Qué tal. Queda tiempo para jugar.

translation.en: -Hockey. -One of those boarding school sports.
translation.es: - Hockey. - Sí, uno de esos deportes.

translation.en: What about Santa? What happens with Christmas?
These elves got it covered.
Uh... Not really.
This was about recognition for making toys.
Delivering them is Santa's thing. Because, you know, the sleigh.
translation.es: Enviarlos es lo de Santa. Ya sabes, el trineo.

translation.en: This isn't a Santa problem. It's a logistics problem.
translation.es: No es problema de Santa. Es de logística.

translation.en: Call in the paper pushers.
Simmons, Hendershot. On my location.
Is this the secret Christmas Party? Bring on the nog.
translation.es: ¿Es la fiesta sorpresa de Navidad? Traigan el ponche.

translation.en: -[both chanting] Nog, nog, nog-- -I got something better than nog.
translation.es: Ponche, ponche Tengo algo mejor que eso.

translation.en: We're gonna solve Christmas toy delivery logistics.
translation.es: Resolveremos la logística de juguetes navideños.

translation.en: One fire dog, coming up.
This stump taken?
Santa? Why are you--?
Is this about the naughty list?
That snowball to the kisser should've sealed the deal.
translation.es: La bola de nieve debió definirlo todo.

translation.en: No one is questioning your naughtiness, or mine.
translation.es: Nadie cuestiona tus travesuras, o las mías.

translation.en: Whoa, you finally made the jump?
Danny, you've been on my naughty list
translation.es: Danny, has estado en mi lista

translation.en: since you were old enough to pass gas at will.
translation.es: desde que echabas gases a voluntad.

translation.en: Continue.
I joined the list 20 minutes ago, and I feel like crud.
translation.es: Me uní a la lista y me sentí mal.

translation.en: But here you are, happy as a clam, roasting hot dogs on a fire--
translation.es: Pero aquí estás, feliz, asando salchichas...

translation.en: Is that last year's bundle of coal?
Doesn't that taste like--
West Virginia?
Oh, yeah.
So how do we live with ourselves when we've been so naughty?
translation.es: ¿Cómo vivimos cuando hemos sido tan traviesos?

translation.en: Papa Noel, I'm glad you asked.
translation.es: Papá Noel, me alegra que preguntaras.

translation.en: First get rid of this idea that naughtiness is bad.
Naughty living is very healthy and very normal.
translation.es: Vivir así es saludable y muy normal.

translation.en: What? You just...
Got my veggies in the naughtiest way.
translation.es: Como mis vegetales de otra forma.

translation.en: Nice needs naughtiness like night needs day
translation.es: El bien las necesita, como la noche al día

translation.en: and turtles need shells to hide their eyes during scary movies.
translation.es: y las tortugas a las conchas para ocultarse.

translation.en: Give a naughty man a hotdog, he'll have a hotdog.
translation.es: Dale una salchicha al travieso, y la comerá.

translation.en: But teach a naughty man to hotdog, and he'll have a ton of hotdogs.
translation.es: Pero enséñale hacer una, y comerá muchísimas.

translation.en: [man] My ear lobe.
Don't forget, every Christmas morning,
naughty kids wake up to coal, which is dead dinosaurs.
translation.es: los traviesos reciben carbón, que son dinosaurios muertos.

translation.en: So while nice kids play with toys...
translation.es: Mientras que los buenos reciben juguetes...

translation.en: ...we're playing with dead dinosaurs.
And that's rad.
[Tippy Tappy Sloppy] Approaching target. Open flaps.
Opening flaps.
And release.
Yes, Templeton?
What makes you think you can do Christmas without Santa?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que puedes hacer su trabajo?

translation.en: Uh, the fact that we are.
translation.es: Por el hecho de que podemos.

translation.en: Let's get industrial fans,
make sure she can handle monsoons in the South Pacific.
translation.es: para que pueda con los monzones del Pacífico Sur.

translation.en: This isn't the same. You need magic and wonder.
translation.es: No es lo mismo. Necesitas magia.

translation.en: Or Christmas is just a bonus birthday with a tree.
translation.es: O sería un cumpleaños extra con un árbol.

translation.en: Yes, but you will get a lot of toys.
-Toys. -Toys.
-Toys. -Toys.
There's more to Christmas than toys.
translation.es: La Navidad es más que eso.

translation.en: It's how awesome it is to see boot marks on snowy roofs.
translation.es: Es lo asombroso que es ver huellas en los techos.

translation.en: -See if we can fake boot marks. -On it.
It's seeing Santa's cookies gone, except a half-eaten one.
translation.es: Es ver que Santa comió las galletas, no a medias.

translation.en: Kids pick it up like, "Santa's teeth touched this."
translation.es: Los niños dicen: "Sus dientes la tocaron".

translation.en: You're holding on to Christmas past. This is Christmas future.
translation.es: Te aferras al pasado. Este es el futuro.

translation.en: Satisfaction guaranteed.
All sales final.
Ha. Silly Gingergoose.
Hello, animal that is not a dog.
translation.es: Hola, eso no es un perro.

translation.en: Dongle, where have you been?
The usual. Living the most incredible life.
translation.es: Lo usual. Viviendo la gran vida.

translation.en: Who's your friend?
My chisel is my friend.
My sander is my confidant.
This one gave me a ride. We are not friends.
translation.es: Me dio un aventón. No somos amigos.

translation.en: We're also not enemies. We're next to each other.
-Any more questions? -Yeah, where are my hollyberries?
translation.es: - ¿Más preguntas? - Sí, ¿y mis bayas de acebo?

translation.en: No more questions from you. But one from Dongle.
translation.es: No más preguntas tuyas. Una de Dongle.

translation.en: Where is the big man?
This is all wrong.
Your fellow elves fighting for recognition is wrong?
translation.es: ¿Que tus compañeros pidan reconocimiento está mal?

translation.en: No, if anyone loves recognition, it's Dongle.
translation.es: No, si a alguien le gusta, es a Dongle.

translation.en: You are Dongle.
I recognize you.
Santa does more than bring toys Dongle makes.
translation.es: Santa hace más que llevar juguetes.

translation.en: He brings people together, makes people feel good.
translation.es: Une a la gente, hace que se sienta bien.

translation.en: Told you.
The world is changing. It's time Christmas catches up.
translation.es: El mundo cambia. La Navidad debe actualizarse.

translation.en: How you sleep at night?
Guilt won't work on me.
Does Dongle look like a disappointed grandmother?
Simple question. How you go to sleep?
Like every hardworking baby American.
Tucked into a firm swaddle with a belly full of milk
translation.es: Debajo de una manta tomando leche

translation.en: and a night-night kiss from Mommy and/or Daddy.
translation.es: y un beso de mamá y/o papá.

translation.en: Night-night kiss is unnecessary, no?
You are tired, full, swaddled. You fall asleep no matter what.
translation.es: Estás cansado, lleno, envuelto. Te duermes.

translation.en: I don't need the kiss, but I like--
Oh, you led me right into that.
Christmas without Santa is like bedtime without night-night kiss.
translation.es: La Navidad sin Santa es como dormir sin un beso.

translation.en: No one wants that.
Fine, you're all big elves. You want Santa back? Go get him.
No, you go.
No chance. Why me?
Because from what you tell Dongle, the Christmas man, he left in bad shape.
translation.es: Porque por lo que le dijiste a Dongle, Santa se fue muy mal.

translation.en: Hollow on the inside, like a grocery store chocolate nutcracker.
translation.es: Vacío por dentro, como un cascanueces de chocolate.

translation.en: He asks himself, "Who am I anymore?"
[Dongle] You break a Santa, you got to fix a Santa.
translation.es: Si partes a Santa, debes arreglarlo.

translation.en: -When you break a Santa this bad, -[snoring]
only one thing can put his heart back together:
translation.es: lo único que puede unir su corazón es:

translation.en: Seeing a bah-humbug stinker like you find the Christmas spirit.
translation.es: que un canalla como tú encuentre el espíritu navideño.

translation.en: You will go get Santa.
And what happens if I don't?
Singing.
-Excuse me? -Hit it.
♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
translation.es: El bebé que arruinó El que arruinó

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.es: El bebé que arruinó la Navidad

translation.en: Ooh. Catchy hook.
Yeah, throw in some verses and a bridge,
translation.es: Sí, dame unos versos y un puente,

translation.en: I bet we could get the whole world singing this.
translation.es: apuesto que podemos hacer que todos la canten.

translation.en: Please, don't.
[Diddly Doo] ♪ He came to the North Pole And started fussing ♪
translation.es: Llegó al Polo Norte Comenzó a quejarse

translation.en: ♪ Made Santa cry With all his cussing ♪
translation.es: Hizo llorar a Santa Con sus groserías

translation.en: [Lala] ♪ He took Father Christmas All sweet and loved ♪
translation.es: Tomó al Padre Lleno de dulzura y amor

translation.en: ♪ And showed him just where He could shove it ♪
translation.es: Y le mostró dónde Podía llevárselo

translation.en: [both] ♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.es: El bebé que arruinó la Navidad

translation.en: This song makes me wanna dance.
And get rid of our Christmas-ruining baby.
translation.es: Y deshacerme del bebé que arruinó la Navidad.

translation.en: [Diddly Doo] ♪ On Christmas morn All the kids did weep ♪
translation.es: En la mañana Los niños lloraron

translation.en: ♪ For not a single toy Lay beneath their feet ♪
translation.es: Ni un juguete Estuvo a sus pies

translation.en: [both] ♪ And just in case you forgot his name ♪
translation.es: Y por si olvidaron su nombre

translation.en: ♪ The baby who we all should blame ♪
translation.es: El bebé al que debemos culpar

translation.en: ♪ Theodore Leslie Templeton ♪
♪ Shame, shame, shame ♪
translation.es: Qué pena, qué pena, qué pena

translation.en: ♪ Christmas burned down ♪
♪ And he lit the flame ♪
I love this song and hate this baby.
translation.es: Me gusta la canción y odio al bebé.

translation.en: ♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
translation.es: El bebé que arruinó El bebé que arruinó

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.es: El bebé que arruinó la Navidad

translation.en: Fine.
Promise me that song never leaves this room, and I'll go get him.
translation.es: Prometan que esa canción no saldrá, iré por él.

translation.en: But we still have a problem.
I'd get him, but I don't know where he is.
translation.es: Yo voy, pero no sé dónde está.

translation.en: [Noth] I can find him.
I'm the Noth Pole.
He gives me creepy motel check-in vibes.
translation.es: Me asusta como un motel barato.

translation.en: Can you really find Santa?
Yes, for a price.
I want the letters to Santa.
-All of them. -[Tim] No way.
Santa needs those to know what every kid wants.
translation.es: Las necesita para saber qué quieren.

translation.en: Oh. I'd love to help, but I'm memorizing children's letters.
translation.es: Me gustaría, pero me las aprendo.

translation.en: If I don't get their requests locked down, it'll take me weeks to deliver gifts.
translation.es: Si no, me tomará semanas enviar los regalos.

translation.en: Deal. You can have every letter.
[all] What?
That's it. Every letter.
We did our part. You do yours.
The smiling red one lurks at the mall in your hometown.
translation.es: El de rojo anda en el centro comercial de tu ciudad.

translation.en: I'll remember none of you.
translation.es: No recordaré a ninguno de ustedes.

translation.en: -[shouts] -Go.
I can't help it. One more time. Two, three, four.
translation.es: No puedo evitarlo. Una vez más. Dos, tres, cuatro.

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
translation.es: El bebé que arruinó El bebé que arruinó

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.es: El bebé que arruinó la Navidad

translation.en: Ron?
You here?
Yo, Ronny.
[groans] Santa?
Time to go.
Boss Baby?
But if someone like you would come for me,
translation.es: Si alguien como tú viene por mí,

translation.en: it's never too late to change things.
There's no amount of naughtiness the Christmas spirit can't--
translation.es: No hay travesuras que la Navidad no pueda...

translation.en: Gonna cut you off before you embarrass yourself worse than that outfit does.
translation.es: Te detendré antes que te avergüences aún más.

translation.en: I'm only here because if I don't bring you back,
translation.es: Vine porque si no te llevo,

translation.en: two pint-size hitmakers are gonna smear my good name all over the Top 40.
translation.es: dos grandulones mancharán mi buen nombre.

translation.en: Diddly Doo and Lala Doo-Da?
I thought the elves were all mad at me because of how naughty I've been.
translation.es: Creí estaban enojados por lo malo que fui.

translation.en: You're not naughty,
just stuck in your ways, and grossly inefficient.
translation.es: solo apegado a tus maneras, e ineficiente.

translation.en: What do you pay in reindeer maintenance for one night of use?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto pagas por los renos por una noche?

translation.en: Can't you lease?
But for reasons beyond me, the elves want you back for Christmas.
translation.es: Pero por otras razones, los duendes te quieren de regreso.

translation.en: -And what about you? -What?
What do you want for Christmas?
Hey, I'm stuck in my ways.
You want something from Santa? Ask. I don't make the rules.
translation.es: ¿Quieres algo de Santa? Pide. No hago las reglas.

translation.en: You absolutely make the...
[groans] Fine.
I got it. I got it.
-Come back to the North Pole. -What, little boy?
[yelling] I'd like you to come back to the North Pole.
translation.es: ¡Me gustaría que regreses al Polo Norte!

translation.en: Santa can do that for you.
I think we just had a Christmas spirit breakthrough.
translation.es: Creo que tenemos el espíritu navideño.

translation.en: Is this what it feels like?
I also want a tie clip, a gold one with wings on it.
translation.es: Quiero el alfiler de corbata, de oro con alas.

translation.en: And one of those electric shoe polishers you see in golf club locker rooms.
translation.es: Y lustradores de zapatos que ves en los camerinos.

translation.en: And gift cards. They're tacky, but it's like plastic money.
translation.es: Y tarjetas de regalos. Ordinarias, pero es dinero en efectivo.

translation.en: That's what the Christmas spirit is.
Asking for things you don't need and don't have time to get.
-No. -Well, hey, you tried.
You have the worst catchphrase.
Yeah? What's yours?
Oh. I was trying to make "fart poop doody" work, but...
translation.es: Quise que funcionara "Ay, popó, caca", pero...

translation.en: [groans] Do your dumb laugh.
You've been busy.
Santa, I'm sorry.
It was everyone else who messed with all the stuff--
-I like it. -I helped.
Dongle. It's jolly to see you.
Dongle is a comforting presence.
A gift from all of us.
But don't worry, Dongle made it.
translation.es: No te preocupes, Dongle lo hizo.

translation.en: A Baby Corp monitor? Um--
Press the talky button.
I'm Baby Corp.
I'm incompetent.
First rule of business, I'm dumb.
Second rule, I forgot, because I'm dumb.
translation.es: Segunda, la olvidé porque soy tonto.

translation.en: Look at the bottom.
[Santa] "Dongle"?
We put our names on everything,
so the children know why they weep with joy when they get a Dongle toy.
translation.es: para que sepan por qué lloran de alegría al recibir uno.

translation.en: It's not the way things have always been done, but...
translation.es: No es como se ha hecho, pero...

translation.en: If the way things are always done leaves people unhappy, who needs it?
translation.es: Si la manera de hacerlas entristece, ¿quién la necesita?

translation.en: It's perfect. I'm sorry I didn't think of this years ago.
translation.es: Es perfecto. Lamento no pensar en esto antes.

translation.en: Anyone know if this is edible?
It's that late?
[Jimbo] It's not edible.
We don't have time. What have I done?
I'll never get the presents out tonight.
translation.es: Nunca dejaré los regalos a tiempo.

translation.en: Is this guy's name Santa or Can't-a?
translation.es: ¿Él se llama Santa o No Puedo?

translation.en: Efficiency, Ron. Still got those gifts memorized?
Do I? TWCAFIJ.
Tim Wants Canadian Action Figure in Jacuzzi.
translation.es: Tim Quiere Figura de Acción En Jacuzzi.

translation.en: He's got them.
-Yeah! -[elves cheering]
Elves, Baby Corp,
let's Christmas.
-Like "let's do this" but-- -We got it. We just don't like it.
-[shouts] -Let's Christmas.
-Yeah! -[all cheering]
Release.
-Toys. -Toys.
-Toys. -Toys.
I'd like your most expensive pinky ring.
Let's just say I've got enough letters
to fill vending machines from Miyazaki to Hokkaido.
translation.es: para llenar máquinas desde Miyazaki a Hokkaido.

translation.en: What?
[Tim] Dear Noth, stop selling letters.
It's not nice.
Here's a present, anyway. Love, Tim.
The scary broken toy I wanted as a kid, but never got.
translation.es: El aterrador juguete que quería de niño.

translation.en: Mom, Dad?
It's Kyle.
[girl 1] A ten-speed bicycle from Ding Dong Dongle, and it's made from wood.
translation.es: Una bicicleta de Ding Dong Dongle, hecha de madera.

translation.en: [girl 2 in French] Jingly Jangly made my teddy bear.
[boy] A baseball mitt.
And Tippy Tappy Sloppy the Elf made it.
translation.es: Y Tippy Tappy Sloppy la hizo.

translation.en: Lucky the kids got Mom's genetics, because Dad is a pile of yikes.
translation.es: Menos mal tiene los genes de mamá, porque papá está mal.

translation.en: [boy] Santa?
-[paper ripping] -[gasps] A yo-yo.
Made by PoopyDoopy the Elf?
Thank you, Santa and PoopyDoopy.
I love it, and promise to share with everyone.
translation.es: Me encanta, y prometo compartirlo con todos.

translation.en: How do we get past the kid?
-You sick St. Nick. -[boy snoring]
I can't believe I delivered presents with Santa.
translation.es: No puedo creer que envié regalos con Santa.

translation.en: Every last one.
Free of charge.
Oh, please, I helped.
Doesn't mean I'll dump my portfolio and move to a commune.
translation.es: No significa que viviré en una comuna.

translation.en: Thank you, Santa.
Merry Christmas.
So, what lame teachable gift
that sums up this whole experience do you have for me?
translation.es: que resume toda esta experiencia me tienes?

translation.en: Santa?
Hello?
Nothing?
Don't you want me to get the Christmas spir--? Ow!
They call me MC Christmas.
The C also stands for Christmas.
-Ted, it's Christmas morning. -What?
We forgot to make snack leis. We'll starve during fruitcake hockey.
translation.es: Olvidamos hacer las guirnaldas. No comeremos en el hockey.

translation.en: We'll ruin our sweet little guy's first traditional Templeton Christmas.
translation.es: Arruinaremos la primera Navidad de los Templeton del chiquitín.

translation.en: What if he isn't into the traditional Templeton Christmas?
They're family traditions. Our family's different now.
translation.es: Son tradiciones. Nuestra familia es diferente.

translation.en: If the way we always do things makes one of us unhappy,
translation.es: Si como hacemos las cosas nos entristece,

translation.en: let's do different things.
-I could come up with new ideas. -Family brainstorm.
What are fun words that rhyme with "wreath"?
Santa gave me snack leis, so this tradition is back on.
translation.es: Santa me regaló una de pasabocas.

translation.en: [both] Fruitcake hockey in the driveway.
-We'll get the sticks. -Wrap the baby in sofa cushions.
translation.es: - Los palos. - Ponle cojines al bebé.

translation.en: Your mom plays violent.
I'll talk them out of that.
You don't have to throw out every tradition for me.
translation.es: No tienes que eliminarlas por mí.

translation.en: You'll do fruitcake hockey and snack leis?
This wearable choking hazard? No.
But I'll play your holiday dessert Canadian stick game.
translation.es: Pero jugaré tu juego canadiense de palitos.

translation.en: -You will? -It's nonsense.
But it can't be all bad if it brings people together, and gets you all smiley.
translation.es: No puede ser malo si une a la gente y la hace reír.

translation.en: Just like Santa.
I guess. I mean, if you squint and don't think about it--
translation.es: Supongo. Si guiñas el ojo y no piensas...

translation.en: No. Feeling Christmas spirit. [shouts]
[Tim] Goal!
[Danny gasps] I got a sock full of dead dinosaurs.
Merry Christmas to all.
The end.
That was in no way a "make us fall asleep" story.
translation.es: No fue un cuento para dormir.

translation.en: -I have so many questions. -Yeah.
Wasn't your setup about why we should do goofy traditions even if we don't want to?
translation.es: ¿No fue por qué hacer tradiciones aun si no queremos?

translation.en: You bailed on that with your brother.
-Then he did some, but not others. -What's the takeaway?
translation.es: - Hizo unas y no otras. - ¿Y la enseñanza?

translation.en: Want easy lessons? Go to kindergarten.
-[Tina] Can I? -Not until you're 5. Go to sleep.
-Five? -How?
You opened a Pandora's box of moral ambiguity.
translation.es: Abriste la caja de la ambigüedad moral.

translation.en: Can we go to the zoo if I don't make fun of the capybaras?
You grew up big and weird.
Okay, all done. Dongle kill kids.
translation.es: Terminamos. Dongle mató a las niñas.

translation.en: Very funny.
Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice--
translation.es: Engáñame una vez, y es tu culpa. Dos...

translation.en: Dongle is serious. The big one deserved it.
translation.es: En serio. La mayor lo merecía.

translation.en: She stopped feeding the Christmas Panda and it died.
translation.es: No alimentó el Panda Navideño y murió.

translation.en: What?
Dongle tricked you again for drama.
translation.es: Dongle te engañó de nuevo por drama.

translation.en: You are welcome for the spice of life.
translation.es: De nada por el picante de la vida.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
[adult Tim] Merry Christmas.
